standard.label: Standard Business Privacy Policy
standard.content:
## Privacy Policy

Last updated: 2025-01-01

We value your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.

### Information We Collect
- Personal information you provide (name, email, etc.)
- Usage data (pages visited, browser type, etc.)

### How We Use Your Information
- To operate and maintain our website
- To respond to inquiries
- To improve user experience

### Cookies
We use cookies to provide essential site functionality and analyze site usage.

### Third-Party Services
We may use third-party tools for analytics, email, or hosting. These providers may collect information subject to their own policies.

### Data Protection
We implement reasonable safeguards to protect your information.

### Your Rights
You can request access, updates, or deletion of your personal data.

### Contact
For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at [Your Email].

gdpr.label: GDPR-Focused Privacy Policy
gdpr.content:
## GDPR Privacy Policy

Last updated: 2025-01-01

This policy outlines how we process personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

### Data Controller
We act as the Data Controller for the personal data you provide.

### Lawful Basis for Processing
We process data on one of the following grounds:
- Consent
- Legitimate interest
- Contractual necessity
- Legal obligation

### Individual Rights
Under GDPR, you have the right to:
- Access your data
- Request correction or deletion
- Withdraw consent
- Object to processing
- Request data portability

### International Transfers
Your data may be processed outside the EU. We ensure appropriate safeguards.

### Contact
You may contact us for GDPR-related requests at [Your Email].

saas.label: SaaS Privacy Policy
saas.content:
## SaaS Privacy Policy

Last updated: 2025-01-01

This Privacy Policy explains how we handle data from users of our SaaS platform.

### Information We Collect
- Account information (name, email)
- Billing information
- Usage data from the SaaS dashboard or APIs

### How We Use Data
- To operate the SaaS service
- To provide customer support
- To send service-related communications

### Subprocessors
We use trusted third-party vendors for hosting, analytics, and billing.

### Data Retention
We retain data only as long as needed for operation or legal obligations.

### Security
We apply industry-standard security practices, including encryption in transit and access controls.

saas_terms.label: SaaS Subscription Terms
saas_terms.content:
## SaaS Subscription Terms

Last updated: 2025-01-01

### Subscription
Access to the service requires a recurring subscription.

### Billing
Fees are billed in advance at the start of each billing period.

### Termination
Either party may terminate with written notice. No refunds for partial periods.

### Acceptable Use
Users may not use the service for illegal or abusive activities.

### Service Availability
We strive for high availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted uptime.

gdpr_cookie.content:

Last updated: 2025-01-01
